item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, February 21, 2025 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. SWE-Bench tainted by answer leakage; real pass rates significantly lower (182 points | 51 comments)
2. Apple pulls data protection tool after UK government security row (614 points | 511 comments)
3. Removing Jeff Bezos from my bed (273 points | 124 comments)
4. Why Ruby on Rails still matters (109 points | 61 comments)
5. Richard Feynman's Blackboard at the Time of His Death (1988) (46 points | 27 comments)
6. Yocto, RockPi and SBOMs: Building Modern Embedded Linux Images (14 points | discuss)
7. DeepDive in everything of Llama3: revealing detailed insights and implementation (61 points | 3 comments)
8. General Reasoning: Free, open resource for building large reasoning models (10 points | 2 comments)
9. Apple Intelligence Comes to Apple Vision Pro in April (30 points | 16 comments)
10. Reality has a surprising amount of detail (2017) (189 points | 86 comments)
11. Launch HN: Massdriver (YC W22) – Self-serve cloud infra without the red tape (31 points | 33 comments)
12. Every .gov Domain (252 points | 202 comments)
13. Posh (YC W22) Is Hiring ( | hide)
14. The CRPG Renaissance, Part 3: TSR Is Dead (33 points | 11 comments)
15. Ancient switch to soft food gave us overbite–the ability to pronounce 'f's,'v' (101 points | 79 comments)
16. Train Your Own O1 Preview Model Within $450 (346 points | 53 comments)
17. Docker limits unauthenticated pulls to 10/HR/IP from Docker Hub, from March 1 (286 points | 323 comments)
18. Show HN: Txeo – A Modern C++ Wrapper for TensorFlow (28 points | 6 comments)
19. I think Yann Lecun was right about LLMs (but perhaps only by accident) (74 points | 49 comments)
20. NASA's James Webb Space Telescope faces potential 20% budget cut (57 points | 17 comments)
21. Johnny.Decimal – A system to organise your life (190 points | 136 comments)
22. Lithium-sulfur battery retains 80% charge capacity after 25,000 cycles (47 points | 16 comments)
23. Show HN: Immersive Gaussian Splat experience of Sutro Tower, San Francisco (759 points | 179 comments)
24. The Profitable Startup (70 points | 17 comments)
25. Suckless.org: software that sucks less (8 points | discuss)
26. All Is Unfinished: Henri Bergson's philosophy for our times (22 points | 5 comments)
27. Rare Photos from Inside North Korea's 'Hotel of Doom' (2023) (154 points | 73 comments)
28. Meta claims torrenting pirated books isn't illegal without proof of seeding (550 points | 367 comments)
29. Fly To Podman: a script that will help you to migrate from Docker (107 points | 64 comments)
30. Show HN: BadSeek – How to backdoor large language models (423 points | 86 comments)
